channel.title: Personal on Tedsig42
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Tedsig42

item.title: Whoami
item.description: I’m Ted “Tedsig42” Regis Kouhouenou, a young Cybersecurity Enthusiast, CTF player, music lover, artist, 22 yo. I spend much of my time at schools like 42 School, Epitech, Holberton School. I spend my free time on Web Security Research, and recently started Bug Bounty. From time to time, I contribute to certain open source projects such as Exegol, The Hacker Recipes and Payload all the things. I play CTF and collaborate with the @TheBugsReapers Vulnerability Researcher / Bug Hunter team.
